channel.title: How do I spawn weapons with console commands?
channel.description: I can explain! In that tunnel near the beginning of surface tension, I turned around at the end after the loading screen, hitting another loading screen and making almost all of my weapons vanish. I played through it anyway because I hadn't noticed but now I'm at the part with the tank and I really wish I still had my crossbow. I really don't feel like playing through the level again to fix this. Does anyone know the commands to spawn weapons? Specifically, the crossbow, tau cannon, tripmines, and ammo for those. I've recovered everything else.

item.title: How do I spawn weapons with console commands?
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
no need to spawn them, just give them to yourself

give

weapon_crowbar
weapon_glock
weapon_357
weapon_mp5
weapon_shotgun
weapon_crossbow
weapon_rpg
weapon_tau
weapon_gluon
weapon_hivehand
weapon_frag
weapon_satchel
weapon_tripmine

Read full topic
